name: Green House Attack
description:
This is a short mobile game where an explosion has taken place in your green house. also the windows build is NOT verified to be stable and WILL have a lot of bugs.

SPOILERS AHEAD:

This is a story based game although it has not been made yet, there are aliens that you need to defeat in order to defeat the boss, anyway that is not implemented yet ! right now enemy's are just black blobs.

SPOILER OVER

you can see my youtube channel: Cent Development for the seeing the development of this game. This is a VERY early beta, and it is going to be updated on itch and also on google play when i upload it there !
